appendix.title: Glossary of Metadata Fields Description
appendix.para: This glossary provides you with brief descriptions of the minimum set of metadata fields required to properly describe a geoghaphical data as well as some optional elements highly suggested for a more extensive standard description.

formalpara.title: Access constraints
formalpara.para: Access constraints applied to assure the protection of privacy or intellectual property, and any special restrictions or limitations on obtaining the resource

formalpara.title: Abstract
formalpara.para: Brief narrative summary of the content of the resource(s)

formalpara.title: Administrative area
formalpara.para: State, province of the location

formalpara.title: * Temporal extent - Begin date
formalpara.para: Formatted as 2007-09-12T15:00:00 (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss)

formalpara.title: Character set
formalpara.para: Full name of the character coding standard used for the metadata set

formalpara.title: Grid spatial representation - Cell geometry
formalpara.para: Identification of grid data as point or cell

formalpara.title: City
formalpara.para: City of the location

formalpara.title: Reference System Info - Code
formalpara.para: Alphanumeric value identifying an instance in the namespace

formalpara.title: Country
formalpara.para: Country of the physical address

formalpara.title: Data quality info
formalpara.para: Provides overall assessment of quality of a resource(s)

formalpara.title: Date
formalpara.para: Reference date and event used to describe it (YYYY-MM-DD)

formalpara.title: Date stamp
formalpara.para: Date that the metadata was created (YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss)

formalpara.title: Date type
formalpara.para: Event used for reference date

formalpara.title: Delivery point
formalpara.para: Address line for the location (as described in ISO 11180, annex A)

formalpara.title: Equivalent scale - Denominator
formalpara.para: The number below the line in a vulgar fraction

formalpara.title: Data Quality - Description
formalpara.para: Description of the event, including related parameters or tolerances

formalpara.title: OnLine resource - Description
formalpara.para: Detailed text description of what the online resource is/does

formalpara.title: Descriptive keywords
formalpara.para: Provides category keywords, their type, and reference source

formalpara.title: Grid spatial representation - Dimension name
formalpara.para: Name of the axis i.e. row, column

formalpara.title: Grid spatial representation - Dimension size
formalpara.para: Number of elements along the axis

formalpara.title: Dimension size Resolution
formalpara.para: Number of elements along the axis

formalpara.title: Distribution info
formalpara.para: Provides information about the distributor of and options for obtaining the resource(s)

formalpara.title: Geographic bounding box - East bound longitude
formalpara.para: Eastern-most coordinate of the limit of the dataset extent, expressed in longitude in decimal degrees (positive east)

formalpara.title: Edition
formalpara.para: Version of the cited resource

formalpara.title: Electronic mail address
formalpara.para: Address of the electronic mailbox of the responsible organization or individual

formalpara.title: Temporal extent - End date
formalpara.para: Formatted as 2007-09-12T15:00:00 (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss)

formalpara.title: Equivalent scale
formalpara.para: Level of detail expressed as the scale of a comparable hardcopy map or chart

formalpara.title: Extent
formalpara.para: Information about spatial, vertical, and temporal extent

formalpara.title: Facsimile
formalpara.para: Telephone number of a facsimile machine for the responsible organization or individual

formalpara.title: File identifier
formalpara.para: Unique identifier for this metadata file

formalpara.title: Vector spatial representation - Geometric object type
formalpara.para: Name of point and vector spatial objects used to locate zero-, one-and two-dimensional spatial locations in the dataset

formalpara.title: Vector spatial representation - Geometric object count
formalpara.para: Total number of the point or vector object type occurring in the dataset

formalpara.title: Geographic bounding box
formalpara.para: Geographic position of the dataset

formalpara.title: Grid spatial representation
formalpara.para: Information about grid spatial objects in the dataset

formalpara.title: Grid spatial representation - Resolution value
formalpara.para: Degree of detail in the grid dataset

formalpara.title: Grid spatial representation - Transformation parameter availability
formalpara.para: Indication of whether or not parameters for transformation exists

formalpara.title: Data Quality - Hierarchy level
formalpara.para: Hierarchical level of the data specified by the scope

formalpara.title: Identification info
formalpara.para: Basic information about the resource(s) to which the metadata applies

formalpara.title: Point of Contact - Individual name
formalpara.para: Name of the responsible person- surname, given name, title separated by a delimiter

formalpara.title: Keyword
formalpara.para: Commonly used word(s) or formalised word(s) or phrase(s) used to describe the subject

formalpara.title: Data Language
formalpara.para: Language used for documenting data

formalpara.title: Metadata - Language
formalpara.para: Language used for documenting metadata

formalpara.title: Data Quality - Lineage
formalpara.para: Non-quantitative quality information about the lineage of the data specified by the scope. Mandatory if report not provided

formalpara.title: OnLine resource - Linkage
formalpara.para: Location (address) for on-line access using a Uniform Resource Locator address or similar addressing scheme such as http://www.statkart.no/isotc211

formalpara.title: Maintenance and update frequency
formalpara.para: Frequency with which changes and additions are made to the resource after the initial resource is completed

formalpara.title: Metadata author
formalpara.para: Party responsible for the metadata information

formalpara.title: Metadata standard name
formalpara.para: Name of the metadata standard (including profile name) used

formalpara.title: Metadata standard version
formalpara.para: Version (profile) of the metadata standard used

formalpara.title: OnLine resource - Name
formalpara.para: Name of the online resource

formalpara.title: Geographic bounding box - North bound latitude
formalpara.para: Northern-most, coordinate of the limit of the dataset extent expressed in latitude in decimal degrees (positive north)

formalpara.title: Grid spatial representation - Number of dimensions
formalpara.para: Number of independent spatial-temporal axes

formalpara.title: Distribution Info - OnLine resource
formalpara.para: Information about online sources from which the resource can be obtained

formalpara.title: Point of Contact - Organisation name
formalpara.para: Name of the responsible organization

formalpara.title: Other constraints
formalpara.para: Other restrictions and legal prerequisites for accessing and using the resource

formalpara.title: Point of contact
formalpara.para: Identification of, and means of communication with, person(s) and organizations(s) associated with the resource(s)

formalpara.title: Point of contact - Position name
formalpara.para: Role or position of the responsible person

formalpara.title: Postal code
formalpara.para: ZIP or other postal code

formalpara.title: Presentation form
formalpara.para: Mode in which the resource is represented

formalpara.title: OnLine resource - Protocol
formalpara.para: Connection protocol to be used

formalpara.title: Purpose
formalpara.para: Summary of the intentions with which the resource(s) was developed

formalpara.title: Reference system info
formalpara.para: Description of the spatial and temporal reference systems used in the datasetData

formalpara.title: Data Quality - Report
formalpara.para: Quantitative quality information for the data specified by the scope. Mandatory if lineage not provided

formalpara.title: Grid spatial representation - Resolution value
formalpara.para: Degree of detail in the grid dataset

formalpara.title: Point of contact - Role
formalpara.para: Function performed by the responsible party

formalpara.title: Geographic bounding box - South bound latitude
formalpara.para: Southern-most coordinate of the limit of the dataset extent, expressed in latitude in decimal degrees (positive north)

formalpara.title: Spatial representation info
formalpara.para: Digital representation of spatial information in the dataset

formalpara.title: Spatial representation type
formalpara.para: Method used to spatially represent geographic information

formalpara.title: Data Quality - Statement
formalpara.para: General explanation of the data producer's knowledge about the lineage of a dataset

formalpara.title: Status
formalpara.para: Status of the resource(s)

formalpara.title: Supplemental Information
formalpara.para: Any other descriptive information about the dataset

formalpara.title: Temporal Extent
formalpara.para: Time period covered by the content of the dataset

formalpara.title: Title
formalpara.para: Name by which the cited resource is known

formalpara.title: Topic category code
formalpara.para: High-level geographic data thematic classification to assist in the grouping and search of available geographic data sets. Can be used to group keywords as well. Listed examples are not exhaustive. NOTE It is understood there are overlaps between general categories and the user is encouraged to select the one most appropriate.

formalpara.title: Grid spatial representation - Transformation parameter availability
formalpara.para: Indication of whether or not parameters for transformation exists

formalpara.title: Vector spatial representation - Topology level
formalpara.para: Code which identifies the degree of complexity of the spatial relationships

formalpara.title: Type
formalpara.para: Subject matter used to group similar keywords

formalpara.title: URL
formalpara.para: Unified Resource Locator

formalpara.title: Use constraints
formalpara.para: Constraints applied to assure the protection of privacy or intellectual property, and any special restrictions or limitations or warnings on using the resource

formalpara.title: Vector spatial representation
formalpara.para: Information about the vector spatial objects in the dataset

formalpara.title: Voice
formalpara.para: Telephone number by which individuals can speak to the responsible organization or individual

formalpara.title: Geographic bounding box - West bound longitude
formalpara.para: Western-most coordinate of the limit of the dataset extent, expressed in longitude in decimal degrees (positive east)
